title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Through Solobrative Learning

context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices with job-linked project implementation

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define language learning objectives and analyze knowledge gaps during the solo inquiry phase.
Learners can complete language projects incorporating peer feedback during the collaborative practice phase.
Learners can self-directedly construct a language learning portfolio using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
